ygData.subject: RE: Question about Augmentation and Rune series.  Also Feedback.
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont remember what the mana is on it I hit 29 last night.  I had a friend teleport me to Erudin to buy my spells then I logged out.  I was able to make a
ygData.messageBody:
I dont remember what the mana is on it I hit 29 last night. I had a friend
teleport me to Erudin to buy my spells then I logged out. I was able to
make a feedback on my first try failed the other 2 times I tried. If I
remember correctly it is 75 mana. It is a damage shield if you are hit the
Mob takes 11 damage from what I can see I tried it on a Black Wolf and it
was only able to hit me once so that was the extent of my test on it. I did
bug the fact that Rune and Agumentation was not stacking but I was having
wierd things happen to me last night so I was hoping that it was just
lastnight and that maybe it does stack but the icon does not show. I will
try it more tonight though.


Give me a message tonight I will be on about 11:30 pst tonight I can give
you the info on it then. If you are looking for one I know most of the
higher level Enchanters. I believe I know someone who has one. I can find
out if he has one. I also am looking for a Strip Enchantment if you have
one or know anyone who does. Give me a message later tonight if you are on.

Kryten Emohawk of EC'I

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Silverlock [mailto:croesus@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 6:30 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Question about Augmentation and Rune series.
> Also Feedback.
>
>
> From: Silverlock <croesus@...>
>
> At 01:07 PM 7/12/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
> It's spelled Sylverlokk, and yes I'm on E'ci, only level 29 though.
> I will test them when I can, If they don't stack thats a bug it
> seems to me
> and should be bugged and feedbacked.
> Can you give me some details about feedback like how much mana it
> costs and
> what it does?
>
>
> >From: "Jeff Wilkinson" <wilkie@...>
> >
> >Is it just me or do these not stack. I was trying to cast Rune II last
> >night with Augmentation on and noticed I was not getting a Icon
> for Rune II.
> >I hope that maybe I was bugged lastnight because it doesn't seem
> right that
> >they dont stack. One is a damage shield and the other is a Agi
> buff. Any
> >one knowing anything about this please let me know.
> >
> >Has Feedback been fixed yet I know there was a problem if the MOB died by
> >Feedback the corpse disappeared.
> >
> >SilverLock I was wondering is that the name of your character on EC'I? I
> >dont ever remember seeing you around there I keep track of most of the
> >higher level enchanters and know most of them.
> >
> >Thanks for your time all.
> >
> >
> >Kryten Emohawk of Ec'i
> >
